title: New Jobs Numbers: Has Economic Recovery Reached A Tipping Point?
teaser: The economy added 288,000 jobs in June and the unemployment rate dropped to 6.1 percent. NPR's Marilyn Geewax and The Wall Street Journal's Sudeep Reddy discuss the latest jobs report.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
